history: Do-sahn is the pseudonym of the patriot Ahn-chong-ho. The twenty four movements represent his entire life, which he devoted to furthering the education of Korea, and its independence movement.

start.description: Start in an attention stance on the intersection of the A.B. and C.D. lines, facing D.. Move the left foot to B to form a parallel ready stance toward D..

movements.description: Pivoting on the ball of the right foot and turning counterclockwise, move the left foot to B. to form a left walking stance toward B. while executing a half-facing high side block to B. with the left outer forearm.
While maintaining a left walking stance toward B., execute a full-facing middle front punch to B. with the right fore-fist.

Prior to moving the body, move the ball of the left foot on the A.B. line, half a shoulder width toward D. and half a shoulder width toward A.. Then, while pivoting on the ball of the left foot and turning clockwise, move the right foot to A. to form a right walking stance toward A., while executing a half-facing high side block to A. with the right outer forearm.
While maintaining a right walking stance toward A., execute a full-facing middle front punch to A. with the left fore-fist.
Move the left foot to D. to form a right L-stance toward D., while executing a half-facing middle knife-hand guarding block to D..

Move the right foot forward to D. to form a right walking stance toward D. while executing a full-facing middle front thrust to D. with the right straight fingertip, putting the back of the left fingertips under the right elbow.

Pivot on the balls of both feet until they face B.D., while twisting the right knife-hand together with the body counterclockwise in a releasing motion until the right palm faces downward. Then, while pivoting on the ball of the right foot and turning counterclockwise, move the left foot to D. to form a left walking stance toward D., while executing a half-facing high side strike to D. with the left back-fist.
Move the right foot forward to D. to form a right walking stance toward D., while executing a half-facing high side strike to D. with the right back-fist.

Pivoting on the ball of the right foot and turning counterclockwise, move the left foot to E. to form a left walking stance toward E., while executing a half-facing high side block to E with the left outer forearm.
While maintaining a left walking stance toward E., execute a full-facing middle front punch to E. with the right fore-fist.

Prior to moving the body, move the ball of the left foot on the E.F. line, half a shoulder width toward C. and half a shoulder width toward F.. Then, while pivoting on the ball of the left foot and turning clockwise, move the right foot to F. to form a right walking stance toward F., while executing a half-facing high side block to F. with the right outer forearm.
While maintaining a right walking stance toward F., execute a full-facing middle front punch to F. with the left fore-fist.

Pivoting on the ball of the right foot and turning counterclockwise, move the left foot to C.E. to form a left walking stance toward C.E., while executing a full-facing high wedging block to C.E. with the outer forearms.
Execute a middle front snap kick to C.E. with the ball of the right foot, while maintaining the full-facing high wedging block to C.E. with the outer forearms.
Lower the right foot to C.E. to form a right walking stance toward C.E., while executing a full-facing middle front punch to C.E. with the right fore-fist.
While maintaining a right walking stance toward C.E., execute a full-facing middle front punch to C.E. with the left fore-fist.

While pivoting on the ball of the left foot and turning clockwise, move the right foot to C.F. to form a right walking stance toward C.F., while executing a full-facing high wedging block to C.F. with the outer forearms.
Execute a middle front snap kick to C.F. with the ball of the left foot, while maintaining the full-facing high wedging block to C.F. with the outer forearms.
Lower the left foot to C.F. to form a left walking stance toward C.F., while executing a full-facing middle front punch to C.F. with the left fore-fist.
While maintaining a left walking stance toward C.F., execute a full-facing middle front punch to C.F. with the right fore-fist. Perform the last two moves in a fast motion.

Pivoting on the ball of the right foot and turning counterclockwise, move the left foot to C. to form a left walking stance toward C., while executing a full-facing rising block to C. with the left outer forearm.
Move the right foot forward to C. to form a right walking stance toward C., while executing a full-facing rising block to C. with the right outer forearm.

Pivoting on the ball of the right foot and turning counterclockwise, move the left foot to B. to form a sitting stance toward D., while executing a side-facing middle side strike to B. with the left knife-hand.

Bring the ball of the left foot straight to the side of the right foot facing D.. Then, in an arching motion, move the right foot to A. to form a sitting stance toward D., while executing a side-facing middle side strike to A. with the right knife-hand.

finish.description: Bring the right foot toward the left foot to form a parallel ready stance toward D..
